Flow.description: Process Builder to send Email alert to super user for requesting to reopen a work order

value.stringValue: AND( [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].Integration_Status__c = "Fail", ISCHANGED([SVMXC__Service_Order__c].LastModifiedDate ), [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].LastModifiedBy.FirstName = 'SNAP Service', [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].LastModifiedBy.LastName = 'Integration', IF(BEGINS([SVMXC__Service_Order__c].OwnerId , '005') && [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].Owner:User.Profile.Name <> 'Customer Service' && [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].Owner:User.IsActive = TRUE, TRUE, FALSE) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_21
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_current.Integration_Status__c} = "Fail", ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.LastModifiedDate} ), {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} = 'SNAP Service', {!myVariable_current.LastModifiedBy.LastName} = 'Integration', IF(BEGINS({!myVariable_current.OwnerId} , '005') && {!myVariable_current.Owner:User.Profile.Name} <> 'Customer Service' && {!myVariable_current.Owner:User.IsActive} = TRUE, TRUE, FALSE) )

value.stringValue: AND( [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].Integration_Status__c = "Fail", ISCHANGED([SVMXC__Service_Order__c].LastModifiedDate ), [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].LastModifiedBy.FirstName = 'SNAP Service', [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].LastModifiedBy.LastName = 'Integration', IF(BEGINS([SVMXC__Service_Order__c].OwnerId , '005') && [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].Owner:User.Profile.Name <> 'Customer Service' && [SVMXC__Service_Order__c].Owner:User.IsActive = TRUE, TRUE, FALSE) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_21_pmetrule
formulas.expression: AND( {!myVariable_old.Integration_Status__c} = "Fail", ISCHANGED({!myVariable_old.LastModifiedDate} ), {!myVariable_old.LastModifiedBy.FirstName} = 'SNAP Service', {!myVariable_old.LastModifiedBy.LastName} = 'Integration', IF(BEGINS({!myVariable_old.OwnerId} , '005') && {!myVariable_old.Owner:User.Profile.Name} <> 'Customer Service' && {!myVariable_old.Owner:User.IsActive} = TRUE, TRUE, FALSE) )

Flow.label: Work Order : Email Alert for Reopen Request
